content: When you first drop in on Lang-Baw-Baw, a load of soldiers will also appear. You can ignore these and let Lang-Baw-Baw tackle them; they make for a good distraction so you can focus on hitting the frog while it attacks the soldiers.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lang-Baw-Baw.md', within the main section titled 'Lang-Baw-Baw', specifically from the subsection 'Lang-Baw-Baw Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When you first drop in on Lang-Baw-Baw, a load of soldiers will also appear. You can ignore these and let Lang-Baw-Baw tackle them; they make for a good distraction so you can focus on hitting the frog while it attacks the soldiers.
